name: Vinsmoke Sora
text: On Play: You may discard a card from your hand: if you have equal to or less DON!! on your field than your opponent, add to your hand up to 1 character card of 4000 Power or less that has the (Vinsmoke Family) type from the trash.

effect.text: You may discard a card from your hand: if you have equal to or less DON!! on your field than your opponent, add to your hand up to 1 character card of 4000 Power or less that has the (Vinsmoke Family) type from the trash.

meta.notes: Card is a sample image with 'SAMPLE' watermark. Rarity is UC as printed. Power and life are 0 as printed.
